languages.text: {n}Нож обновляет обеты, вычерченные на моей коже. Не боль, но тень воспоминания о ней — ибо я не ведаю больше боли, — очищает разум.{/n}
{n}The knife renews the vows inscribed on my skin. There is no pain now, for I am beyond this, but the memory of it still clears my mind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Нож обновляет обеты, вычерченные на моей коже. Не боль, но тень воспоминания о ней — ибо я не ведаю больше боли, — очищает разум.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Messer erneuert die Gelübde auf meiner Haut. Ich spüre keinen Schmerz, darüber bin ich hinweg, aber die Erinnerung daran klärt dennoch meinen Geist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The knife renews the vows inscribed on my skin. There is no pain now, for I am beyond this, but the memory of it still clears my mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Messer erneuert die Gelübde auf meiner Haut. Ich spüre keinen Schmerz, darüber bin ich hinweg, aber die Erinnerung daran klärt dennoch meinen Geist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El cuchillo renueva los juramentos inscritos en mi piel. No hay dolor, pues estoy por encima de ello, pero su recuerdo aún despeja mi mente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The knife renews the vows inscribed on my skin. There is no pain now, for I am beyond this, but the memory of it still clears my mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El cuchillo renueva los juramentos inscritos en mi piel. No hay dolor, pues estoy por encima de ello, pero su recuerdo aún despeja mi mente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ナイフが私の肌に刻まれた誓いを新たにする。もう痛みは感じない。乗り越えたけれど、その記憶はまだハッキリ心に残っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The knife renews the vows inscribed on my skin. There is no pain now, for I am beyond this, but the memory of it still clears my mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ナイフが私の肌に刻まれた誓いを新たにする。もう痛みは感じない。乗り越えたけれど、その記憶はまだハッキリ心に残っている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}我手中的利刃再次刻下了印在皮肉上的誓言。如今，我已经摆脱了痛苦，但这件事情的记忆仍然清晰地浮现在我的脑海里。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The knife renews the vows inscribed on my skin. There is no pain now, for I am beyond this, but the memory of it still clears my mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}我手中的利刃再次刻下了印在皮肉上的誓言。如今，我已经摆脱了痛苦，但这件事情的记忆仍然清晰地浮现在我的脑海里。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le couteau renouvelle les vœux inscrits sur ma peau. Je suis désormais au-delà de la douleur, mais son souvenir m'éclaircit encore l'esprit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The knife renews the vows inscribed on my skin. There is no pain now, for I am beyond this, but the memory of it still clears my mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le couteau renouvelle les vœux inscrits sur ma peau. Je suis désormais au-delà de la douleur, mais son souvenir m'éclaircit encore l'esprit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bıçak, derime kazınmış yeminleri tazeliyor. Artık acı yok zira acının da ötesindeyim. Fakat acının hatırası, zihnimi hâlâ temizleyebiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The knife renews the vows inscribed on my skin. There is no pain now, for I am beyond this, but the memory of it still clears my mind.{/n}
